title: Cluster Rocket I
summaries: The Cluster Rocket I is a type of rocket ammunition. Unlike the Cluster Rocket II, it does not destroy tiles. Unique from other rockets, cluster rockets shoot out shrapnel that create several secondary explosions which deal half of the base damage.
It can be purchased from the Cyborg for 7 SC50 CC each after completing the Martian Madness event.

statistics.Buy: 7 SC50 CC
statistics.Sell: 1 SC50 CC
